column1: I love this product! 😊 It's amazing and works perfectly.
The delivery was late but the item was fine.
Fantastic support team! 😍 They helped me a lot.
Battery drains too fast. Not happy at all. 🔋
Item was broken on arrival. Very bad experience. 👎
I am fearful about using this again after my last experience.
Product quality is bad. 😢 I want a refund.
Just okay. Not too great, not too bad.
Amazing performance! 😁 Loved it so much.
Packaging was disgusting. The product was leaking. 🤢
I’m surprised how fast it arrived! 😱
No emojis here but still a great product.
